text: Pawn Stars ’ “ Old Man ” has passed away. Richard Harrison, the co - owner and founder of Rick Harrison ’ s Gold & Silver Pawn Shop, died on Monday, June 25, at 77, the Harrison family confirmed to Us Weekly. “ Richard Benjamin ‘ The Old Man ’ Harrison passed away this morning surrounded by those he loved. He will be tremendously missed by our family, the team at Gold & Silver Pawn and his many fans the world over. He was my hero and I was fortunate to get a very cool ‘ Old Man ’ as my dad, ” Rick Harrison, 53, said in a statement to Us. “ That I got to share him with so many others and they got to see what a great family man he was is something I am grateful to have experienced with him.
